item.title: Byapon - Bengali Youth Science Magazine Platform
item.author: abdulohab059@gmail.com (Abdul Wahab)
item.description: Byapon is one of Bangladesh’s most beloved youth science magazines, and I had the incredible honor of developing their digital platform. This project wasn’t just a development task for me — it was a passion project. Being able to contribute to a platform that nurtures young scientific minds in Bangladesh felt deeply meaningful. I learned so much while building this project, and it’s an experience I will carry with me for the rest of my life.
